short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show all the network calls performed by a page and automatically generate your stubby mocked calls

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Show all the network calls performed by a page and automatically generate your stubby mocked calls.

When you have the tab you want to spy opened in Chrome, click on the extension's icon. 

A window will popup. 

Allow that the extension is using your console/debugger. 

Since now, all the XHR requests performed by that tab, will be shown in the opened window. 

Open the details of each request, and go to the Stubby Tab, in order to see the stubby data corresponding to that request. 

You can easily copy the content using the "Copy To Clipboard" button.
